text: Riva Valdobbia is a frazione in the Province of Vercelli in the Italian region of Piedmont. It is about north of Turin and about northwest of Vercelli. It's an Italian village of 265 people in the upper Valsesia, in the province of Vercelli, in Piedmont. On 1 January 2019, it was an independent comune merged to form the neighboring municipality of Alagna Valsesia. == References == Category:Former municipalities of Vercelli
title: Riva Valdobbia
